:root{--clr-blue:rgba(45,156,219,0.7);--clr-green:rgba(39,174,96,0.7);--clr-red:rgba(235,87,87,0.7);--clr-gray1:#333;--clr-gray2:#4f4f4f;--clr-gray3:#828282;--clr-gray4:#bdbdbd;--clr-gray6:#f2f2f2}*,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none;box-sizing:border-box}html{font-size:10px}a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,html,input,p{font-family:Poppins,sans-serif}p{font-size:1.2rem;line-height:1.8rem;color:var(--clr-gray2)}.container{max-width:1110px;padding:0 40px;margin:0 auto}.container-lg,.container-xl{padding:0 10px!important}h2{font-size:2.4rem;line-height:3.6rem;font-weight:500;color:var(--clr-gray1)}img{width:100%;max-width:100%;height:auto;border-radius:24px}.btn{padding:10px 20px;border-radius:12px;border:0;font-weight:500;font-size:16px;line-height:24px;transition:background-color .3s ease-in;cursor:pointer}.btn-default{background-color:#e0e0e0;color:#828282}.btn-default:hover{background-color:#cacaca}.btn-blue,.btn-green,.btn-red{color:#fff}.btn-blue{background-color:rgba(45,156,219,.7)}.btn-blue:hover{background-color:rgba(27,110,158,.7)}.btn-green{background-color:rgba(39,174,96,.7)}.btn-green:hover{background-color:rgba(27,122,67,.7)}.btn-red{background-color:rgba(235,87,87,.7)}.btn-red:hover{background-color:rgba(201,24,24,.7)}section{margin-bottom:100px}.form{margin-top:31px}.form label{font-size:1rem;line-height:1.5rem;color:var(--clr-gray3)}.btn-input{background-color:#f2f2f2;height:47px;border-radius:12px;padding:4px 4px 4px 19px;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;margin-top:4px}input{outline:none;background-color:transparent;border:none;max-width:60%}input::placeholder{font-size:1.4rem;line-height:2.1rem;color:var(--clr-gray4)}.home{margin-top:48px}.home .question{font-size:1.2rem;line-height:1.8rem;font-weight:500;color:var(--clr-blue)}.home .home__image{margin-bottom:22px;margin-top:15px;border-radius:18px}.home p{margin-top:33px}.home .form{margin-top:31px}.feature{margin-top:94px;padding:46px 35px}.feature h3{margin-top:3.5rem;font-weight:700;font-size:2.4rem;line-height:3.6rem;color:var(--clr-gray1)}.feature p{margin-top:2.4rem;font-size:1.6rem;line-height:2.4rem;color:var(--clr-gray2)}.feature .btn{margin-top:30px}.feature.rounded{background:#fff;box-shadow:0 10px 30px rgba(51,51,51,.1);border-radius:24px}.feat-icon{height:67px;width:67px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.works{display:initial}.work{margin-top:4.8rem}.work__image{margin-bottom:1.2rem}.work__type{font-weight:300;font-size:1.2rem;line-height:1.8rem;color:var(--clr-gray3)}.work__title{font-size:1.8rem;line-height:2.7rem;color:var(--clr-gray1)}.link-special{text-decoration:none;color:var(--clr-blue);font-size:18px;line-height:27px;display:flex;align-items:center;margin-top:3.5rem}.link-special span{margin-right:12px}.clients__subtitle{font-weight:500;font-size:1.8rem;line-height:2.7rem;color:var(--clr-red)}.clients p{font-size:1.6rem;line-height:2.4rem;margin-top:1.4rem;padding-right:9.2rem}.clients__gallery{margin-top:3.6rem;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-template-rows:repeat(4,70px);column-gap:8px;row-gap:8px}.clients__gallery img{height:100%;object-fit:cover}.clients__gallery img:first-child{grid-column:2/3;grid-row:1/3}.clients__gallery img:nth-child(2){grid-column:2/3;grid-row:3/5}.clients__gallery img:nth-child(3){grid-column:1/2;grid-row:2/4}.clients__quote{font-size:2.4rem;line-height:3.6rem;margin-top:100px}.clients__person-box{display:flex;margin-top:2.7rem}.clients__person-box img{width:8.2rem;height:8.2rem}.clients__person-box .details{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;padding:4px 0;margin-left:3rem}.clients__person-box .details__name{font-size:2.4rem;line-height:3.6rem;color:var(--clr-gray1)}.clients__person-box .details__nickname{font-weight:500;font-size:1.8rem;line-height:2.7rem;color:var(--clr-gray3)}.contact{background-color:#000;padding:36px 16px}.contact .menu-footer li a{font-size:1.8rem;line-height:200%;color:#fff;text-decoration:none}.contact .logo-footer{margin-top:6.4rem;font-weight:800;font-size:3.6rem;line-height:5.3rem;color:var(--clr-gray6)}.contact .social{display:flex;margin-top:.8rem}.contact .social a:not(:last-child){margin-right:1.2rem}.contact .form-footer{margin-top:6.4rem}.contact .copyright{margin-top:100px;font-weight:600;font-size:1.4rem;line-height:1.7rem;color:#a9a9a9;text-align:center}@media screen and (min-width:767px){.container-lg{padding:0 40px!important}h2{font-size:4.8rem;line-height:7.2rem}.home p{font-size:1.8rem;line-height:2.7rem}.form label{font-size:1.4rem;line-height:2.1rem}input::placeholder{font-size:1.8rem;line-height:2.7rem}.work__type{font-size:1.4rem;line-height:2.1rem}.features-list{display:flex}.clients__container{display:flex;align-items:center}.contact__items{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.contact .form-footer,.contact .logo-footer{margin-top:0}}@media screen and (min-width:860px){.container{padding:0 150px}.container-sm{max-width:370px}.container-lg{padding:0 100px!important}.home{margin-top:100px}.home__image{margin:42px 0}.works{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-template-rows:repeat(5,auto);column-gap:30px;row-gap:30px}.works .work:first-child{grid-column:1/2;grid-row:2/4}.works .work:nth-child(2){grid-column:2/2;grid-row:1/3}.works .work:nth-child(3){grid-column:1/2;grid-row:4/6}.works .work:nth-child(4){grid-column:2/2;grid-row:3/5}.link-special{justify-content:flex-end;margin-top:-26px}.clients__gallery{grid-template-rows:repeat(4,90px)}}@media screen and
